column4: qterm is a BBS client - not sure if it supports telnet BBS though - but you could give it a shot
thanks i have tried qterm in the past w/o good luck. i'll see if i can find the latest devel and it's progress
also you could look into adding a vga font "vga.pcf" I had much more success using it to render ANSI/ASCI with gnome-terminal.  Good luck man (old school BBSs rule!)
